[event]
# to Perdition Harbor
type=on_trigger
location=16,45,1,2
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/perdition_harbor.txt,32,20
soundfx=soundfx/environment/stairs.ogg,0,0
tooltip=Perdition Harbor

[event]
# to Salted Field
type=on_trigger
location=15,5,2,1
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/salted_field.txt,11,44
soundfx=soundfx/environment/stairs.ogg,0,0
tooltip=Salted Field

[event]
# brazier sound effect
type=on_load
location=10,20,1,1
soundfx=soundfx/environment/open_fire_loop.ogg

[event]
# brazier sound effect
type=on_load
location=20,20,1,1
soundfx=soundfx/environment/open_fire_loop.ogg

[event]
# brazier sound effect
type=on_load
location=20,30,1,1
soundfx=soundfx/environment/open_fire_loop.ogg

[event]
# brazier sound effect
type=on_load
location=10,30,1,1
soundfx=soundfx/environment/open_fire_loop.ogg

[event]
# Wind sound
type=on_load
location=0,0,1,1
soundfx=soundfx/environment/cave_wind_loop.ogg
